general.gigTitle: develop wordpress or custom ecommerce website design

sellerCard.oneLiner: We are your ultimate experts in delivering comprehensive web solutions
sellerCard.description:
Hi Everyone,

I'm offering Website Design & Development Services. We're a full-time Full Stack Developer and WordPress developer. 

We have an excellent work ethic and treat every project large or small with the same 100% involvement, integrity, and professionalism. 

We have highly experienced team members who always want to tackle the biggest challenges. 

I am friendly and approachable so contact me to discuss your ideas and requirements. 

I look forward to hearing from you

description.content:
Welcome to my gig! 


It's great to see you. Let's grow your business with amazing e-commerce or custom kinds of websites such as real estate, booking, rental, multi-vendor, tutor & tuition, online course, agency, portfolio, and agency, etc using WordPress or custom. 


I can also build ReactJS, NextJS, and websites based on your requirements such as an admin dashboard system, portal, inventory management, etc.


So, if you think you will need a WordPress or Custom website let's start today.


What Will You Get in Custom?

  • Custom Dashboard
  • Custom Layout Design that will be a business or e-commerces
  • Modern Professional and Dynamic functional features like real estate portal, catering with events, pet owner, dynamic tag features, blog, e-commerce, and others
  • Responsive for all devices
  • SEO metadata will added


What Will You Get in WordPress?

  • E-commerce, blog, services, agency, and any kind of websites
  • Search Engine Friendly (Yoast or Rank Math SEO)
  • Premium WordPress Theme and Plugins
  • Social, Booking & Payment Integration



Let's build your website using WordPress or custom and You will get a custom dashboard if you go with the custom build.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will need your cpanel access or Hosting access or wordpress access.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Where do I purchase hosting and domain?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please contact me first so that I can get your requirements then I will suggest you

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you support me after project complete?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, of course. I will support you when you need me. I will also create some videos so that it helps you to manage the store itself

questionsAndAnswers.question: I don't have any content for my website what should I do now?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Don't worry. We will use AI tools based on the requirements

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you build the website using WordPress?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I do. I can build your website using WordPress based on your requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: If I need any custom website can you do that?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes I can build your website using custom code like ReactJS or NextJS with SEO as well.

questionsAndAnswers.question: If I need any custom functionality are you able to make it?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, of course. I'd like to build your any type of functional website.

packageList.title: Silver
packageList.description: WP + Ecommerce + Professional Layout + Payment + SEO Setup for any kind of website

packageList.title: Gold
packageList.description: Full Website + Ecommerce + Payment + Newsletter + Booking + Design Customization + Content Upload

packageList.title: Diamond
packageList.description: All ecommerce features with dynamic functionality will be added with basic and standard

reviews.comment: Raf was a lovely guy to communicate and talk to, he called on zoom often to.make sure we were on the same level. quick time response to what we needed.

seller_response.comment:
Thank you and it was a good time with you. We did several zoom calls because the client was totally new on the wordpress website. I had to explain a lot and sometimes he was super confused and I never felt disturbed until he understood. 

However, I did my best and delivered the order based on the requirements.

reviews.comment:
Outstanding Website Designer!

Highly impressed with the service! Fast response, efficient, and doesnt waste time. Went above and beyond to deliver exactly what I needed. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a reliable and skilled website designer.

He is very cooperative and responsive all the time. I like to work with people who are flexible and give me
 good advice to my business

Code Quivers made an exellent job in this website development project. Their attention to detail and code expertise exceeded expectations, and working with them was seamless. i Highly recommend Rifique

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much. You helped me a lot as well to complete the site. I appreciate your support and hopefully it will grow business.

reviews.comment: I have never meet such a better guy. He took my idea and blew it out of the park. I would highly highly highly recommend him.
